# boothsmultiply

Implementation of [Booth's multiplication algorithm](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Booth%27s_multiplication_algorithm) in C.

Output with default `input.txt` in repository:

```

Booth's Signed Multiplication Algorithm

Multiply 0110101101 and 1100011001

0000000000 1100011001   0       0110101101      1001010011      Populate Data
1001010011 1100011001   0       0110101101      1001010011      A = A - M
1100101001 1110001100   1       0110101101      1001010011      Shift
0011010110 1110001100   1       0110101101      1001010011      A = A + M
0001101011 0111000110   0       0110101101      1001010011      Shift
0000110101 1011100011   0       0110101101      1001010011      Shift
1010001000 1011100011   0       0110101101      1001010011      A = A - M
1101000100 0101110001   1       0110101101      1001010011      Shift
1110100010 0010111000   1       0110101101      1001010011      Shift
0101001111 0010111000   1       0110101101      1001010011      A = A + M
0010100111 1001011100   0       0110101101      1001010011      Shift
0001010011 1100101110   0       0110101101      1001010011      Shift
0000101001 1110010111   0       0110101101      1001010011      Shift
1001111100 1110010111   0       0110101101      1001010011      A = A - M
1100111110 0111001011   1       0110101101      1001010011      Shift
1110011111 0011100101   1       0110101101      1001010011      Shift

0110101101 * 1100011001 = 11100111110011100101

429 * -231 = -99099

Multiply 0110 and 1101

0000 1101       0       0110    1010    Populate Data
1010 1101       0       0110    1010    A = A - M
1101 0110       1       0110    1010    Shift
0011 0110       1       0110    1010    A = A + M
0001 1011       0       0110    1010    Shift
1011 1011       0       0110    1010    A = A - M
1101 1101       1       0110    1010    Shift
1110 1110       1       0110    1010    Shift

0110 * 1101 = 11101110

6 * -3 = -18

Multiply 110110 and 100101

000000 100101   0       110110  001010  Populate Data
001010 100101   0       110110  001010  A = A - M
000101 010010   1       110110  001010  Shift
111011 010010   1       110110  001010  A = A + M
111101 101001   0       110110  001010  Shift
000111 101001   0       110110  001010  A = A - M
000011 110100   1       110110  001010  Shift
111001 110100   1       110110  001010  A = A + M
111100 111010   0       110110  001010  Shift
111110 011101   0       110110  001010  Shift
001000 011101   0       110110  001010  A = A - M
000100 001110   1       110110  001010  Shift

110110 * 100101 = 000100001110

-10 * -27 = 270

Multiply 11001111 and 11001100

00000000 11001100       0       11001111        00110001        Populate Data
00000000 01100110       0       11001111        00110001        Shift
00000000 00110011       0       11001111        00110001        Shift
00110001 00110011       0       11001111        00110001        A = A - M
00011000 10011001       1       11001111        00110001        Shift
00001100 01001100       1       11001111        00110001        Shift
11011011 01001100       1       11001111        00110001        A = A + M
11101101 10100110       0       11001111        00110001        Shift
11110110 11010011       0       11001111        00110001        Shift
00100111 11010011       0       11001111        00110001        A = A - M
00010011 11101001       1       11001111        00110001        Shift
00001001 11110100       1       11001111        00110001        Shift

11001111 * 11001100 = 0000100111110100

-49 * -52 = 2548

Multiply 00001111 and 00001111

00000000 00001111       0       00001111        11110001        Populate Data
11110001 00001111       0       00001111        11110001        A = A - M
11111000 10000111       1       00001111        11110001        Shift
11111100 01000011       1       00001111        11110001        Shift
11111110 00100001       1       00001111        11110001        Shift
11111111 00010000       1       00001111        11110001        Shift
00001110 00010000       1       00001111        11110001        A = A + M
00000111 00001000       0       00001111        11110001        Shift
00000011 10000100       0       00001111        11110001        Shift
00000001 11000010       0       00001111        11110001        Shift
00000000 11100001       0       00001111        11110001        Shift

00001111 * 00001111 = 0000000011100001

15 * 15 = 225
```
